sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memasak menggunakan wajan.
english translation: I cook using a pan.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menyukai roti dengan selai.
english translation: I like bread with jam.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mi goreng adalah hidangan favorit saya.
english translation: Fried noodles are my favorite dish.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sayur asem menggunakan terung sebagai salah satu bahan.
english translation: Sour vegetable soup uses eggplant as one of the ingredients.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya tidak suka bawang merah.
english translation: I don't like red onions.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bubur ayam adalah hidangan sarapan yang populer.
english translation: Chicken porridge is a popular breakfast dish.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pizza tidak lengkap tanpa keju.
english translation: Pizza is not complete without cheese.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka pasta carbonara.
english translation: I like carbonara pasta.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Spageti bolognese adalah hidangan Italia yang terkenal.
english translation: Bolognese spaghetti is a famous Italian dish.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sayur pelengkap untuk hidangan malam saya adalah brokoli.
english translation: The side dish for my dinner is broccoli.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kue ubi manis adalah makanan penutup yang lezat.
english translation: Sweet potato cake is a delicious dessert.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Rasa gurih pada masakan itu membuatnya nikmat.
english translation: The savory taste of the dish makes it delicious.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jika kamu pergi, aku akan merindukanmu.
english translation: If you go, I will miss you.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya membutuhkan beberapa bahan untuk masakan ini, yaitu daging sapi dan bawang.
english translation: I need some ingredients for this dish, that is beef and onions.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Banyak orang berbeda-beda dalam memilih profesi.
english translation: Many people have different preferences in choosing a profession.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memiliki karier yang sukses di bidang musik.
english translation: He has a successful career in music.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kakek saya adalah seorang nelayan yang hebat.
english translation: My grandfather is a great fisherman.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tukang kayu membuat meja baru untuk rumah kami.
english translation: The carpenter is making a new table for our house.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Raja itu memiliki banyak kekayaan.
english translation: The king has a lot of wealth.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Putra mahkota akan menjadi pangeran di masa depan.
english translation: The crown prince will become a prince in the future.
